body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Shop Plus. My name is Scott Perry. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Hannah Powell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Hannah. Can you please provide your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is eight nine seven six five four three two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. Can you also confirm your email address with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, my email address is hannah.powell@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Hannah. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I need help with returning a recent purchase. I'm feeling frustrated about the process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Hannah. We will do our best to assist you with the return. Thank you for your time and patience.
